function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Ambient pollutants leading to increased infection risk from SARS-CoV-2","Impact":"Higher risk of SARS-CoV-2 infection and respiratory problems","Mitigation":"Reducing ambient pollutants and increasing green spaces","Technologies":"Air purifiers, pollution control technologies, green infrastructure","People":"General population, particularly those in urban areas","Owner":"Government, environmental organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of adherence to infection prevention measures","Impact":"Increased spread of contagious diseases like SARS-CoV-2","Mitigation":"Promoting adherence to preventive measures like wearing masks and social distancing","Technologies":"Communication tools, public health campaigns","People":"General population","Owner":"Government, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Weaker stimulus for outdoor activities in non-forest green spaces","Impact":"Reduced physical activity and potential for overcrowding in other green spaces","Mitigation":"Promoting outdoor activities in non-forest green spaces, urban planning for open spaces","Technologies":"Urban planning tools, recreational facilities","People":"Community members, urban planners","Owner":"Local government, community organizations"}]}
